description:
AAAAAAAAA
Permet de prendre trois actions le prochain tour!
name: Sursaut d'adrénaline

description:
Une petite chanson qu'il faut chuchotter à l'oreille.
Magiquement, à tout les coups ça endort la personne.
name: Chansonnette

description: Se protéger en couvrant la cible pour le tour.
name: Protéger

description:
Un gros coup, mais sur la tête!
Assomme brièvement le récipient.
name: Bonk

description:
À la mémoire de Jésus-du-Brun.
Redonne 25 + M. Atk points de vie à la cible.
name: Touche-Pipi
note:
<<aaa_anim self wiggle>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: "BrunRestorationCast",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
    this.subject().startAnimation(144, false, 0);
}>>

name: Cuckoo enemi
note:
<<aaa_anim self wiggle>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: "Chicken",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
}>>

name: Wiggle
note:
<<aaa_anim self wiggle>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: "Gnieh",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
}>>

name: Pondre
note:
<<aaa_anim self jump>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: "Jump1",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
}>>
<<aaa_action {
    this.makeSuccess(this.subject());
}>>

name: Éclore
note:
<<aaa_anim self jump>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: "Chicken",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
    this.subject().transform(6);
    $gameTroop.makeUniqueNames();
}>>
<<aaa_action {
    $gsw.DES_POULES_CALICE = true;
}>>

name: Embrace
note:
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    this.subject().pushMoves([
        [SE, { name: "_WindoEmbrace" }],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, -3, 3, -20, 12],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Break", volume: 50 }],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 0, 0, -60, 24],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Break" }],
        [SHAKE, { power: 1, speed: 9, duration: 20}],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [PATTERN, 0]
    ]);
}>>
<<aaa_action {
    this.subject()._targets = [target];
    this.subject()._counter = 1;
}>>

name: Extend
note:
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    this.subject().pushMoves([
        [SE, { name: "_WindoExtend" }],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, -3, 3, -20, 12],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Break", volume: 50 }],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 0, 0, -60, 24],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Break" }],
        [SHAKE, { power: 1, speed: 9, duration: 20}],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [PATTERN, 0]
    ]);
}>>
<<aaa_targets this.subject()._targets>>
<<aaa_action {
    this.subject()._counter = 2;
    var clone = $btl.clones.pop();
    if (clone) {
        clone.transformAsClone(target);
        clone._taper = target._taper;
        clone.startAnimation(149, false, 0);
        clone.appear();
    }
}>>

name: Extinguish
note:
<<aaa_performActionStart {    
    this.subject().pushMoves([
        [SE, { name: "_WindoExtinguish" }],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 6, 3, -20, 12],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Break", volume: 50 }],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [PATTERN, 0],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 20, -6, -40, 18],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Break", volume: 75 }],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [PATTERN, 0],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 100, 0, -20, 8],
        [SHAKE, { power: 1, speed: 9, duration: 20}],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [PATTERN, 0],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 66, -6, -10, 16],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [PATTERN, 0],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 33, 6, -10, 16],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [PATTERN, 0],
        [WAIT, 2],
        [PATTERN, 1],
        [PARABOLA, 0, 0, -10, 16],
        [PATTERN, 2],
        [WAIT, 4],
        [PATTERN, 0],
    ]);
}>>
<<aaa_targets this.subject()._targets>>

name: Sortilège
note:
<<aaa_anim self wiggle>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
  this.subject().startAnimation(151, false, 0);
}>>
<<aaa_action {
  var subject = this.subject();
  target._pointeCounter = (target._pointeCounter || 0) + 1;
  subject.addState(20);
  subject._targets = [target];
}>>

name: Tapoche
note:
<<aaa_anim self lunge>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: this.subject()._taper || "Ahha",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
    if (this.subject().isStateAffected(24)) {
        $btl.storedProc = $btl.storedProc || [];
        $btl.storedProc.push(this._item._itemId);
    }
}>>

description:
Le secret retrouvé des Fins de Phrases!
Restaure l'état d'un allié et lui redonne foi en lui!
name: Fins de Phrases

description:
Invoque le Côté Obscur de la Phrase afin de dérober
20 + M. Atk points de vie à une cible.
message1: invoque le Côté Obscur de la Phrase!
name: Obscurité Phrasique
note:
<<aaa_anim self wiggle>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    AudioManager.playSe({
        name: "Omnomnomnom",
        volume: 90,
        pitch: 100
    });
}>>

name: Lancer de Table
note:
<<aaa_anim self lunge>>
<<aaa_performActionStart {
    this.subject().startAnimation(162, false, 0);
    if (this.subject().isStateAffected(24)) {
        $btl.storedProc = $btl.storedProc || [];
        $btl.storedProc.push(this._item._itemId);
    }
}>>
<<aaa_action {
  let table = $btl.tables.pop();
  if (!table) return;
  
  let idx = target.index();
  let sprite = SceneManager.battlerSprite(table);
  Sprite_Actor.prototype.setActorHome.call(sprite, idx);
  sprite._homeY += 19;
  sprite.updatePosition();
  table.appear();
  table._lastTargetIndex = idx;
}>>

description: Gaboué démontre ses talents de barbage devant tous.
name: Barbe Éclatante
Tombage de Table
note:
<<aaa_targets {
  let index = this.subject()._lastTargetIndex;
  let lastTarget = $gameParty.members()[index];
  return [lastTarget];
}>>
<<aaa_action {
  let index = this.subject()._lastTargetIndex;
  let lastTarget = $gameParty.members()[index];
  lastTarget.removeState(23);
  this.subject().hide()
  $btl.tables = $btl.tables || [];
  $btl.tables.push(this.subject());
}>>

description: Augmente les dégâts du poulet de 3!
name: Cuckoo
Poulet
note:
<<aaa_performActionStart {
  this.subject().startAnimation(168, false, 0);
  this.subject().pushMoves([
    [PARABOLA, -40, 0, -10, 8],
    [PARABOLA, -48, 3, -40, 12],
    [MOTION, "walk"],
    [WAIT, 40],
    [OPACITY, 0]
  ]);
}>>
<<aaa_action {
  $gameParty.transformActor(1, 7, true);
  $btl.party.Poulet.startAnimation(166, false, 0);
  $btl.party.Poulet.addState(30);
  this.subject().pushMoves([
    [WAIT, 5],
    [OPACITY, 255],
    [MOVE, -48, 0, 0],
    [WAIT, 17],
    [PARABOLA, -46, -3, -70, 18],
    [PARABOLA, -48, 3, -30, 8],
    [WAIT, 20],
    [PARABOLA, 0, 0, -10, 8]
  ]);
}>>

description:
Protège la cible en agumentant la défense physique et 
électrique. Endommage les attaquants.
name: Bouclier Électrique

description:
Une fois par combat, invoque une boule de feu pour 
25pt de dégâts. Stats de l'usager ne s'appliquent pas.
name: UIUI of Feu

description:
Une fois par combat, donne +10 de protection pendant 
quelques tours.
message1: active le pouvoir de sa robe!
name: Robe de Dureté

description:
Lance votre lance actuellement équipée. Il faut aller
la chercher afin de pouvoir continuer à taper.
name: Lancement de Lance
note:
<<aaa_action {
  const subject = this.subject();
  subject.addState(36);
  const targetSprite = SceneManager.battlerSprite(target);
  subject._lanceX = targetSprite.x;
  subject._lanceY = targetSprite.y;
}>>

description:
Timidement aller chercher votre lance précédemment 
lancée.
name: Récupération de Lance
note:
<<aaa_action {
  const subject = this.subject();
  const sprite = SceneManager.battlerSprite(subject);
  const dx = (subject._lanceX || 0) - sprite._homeX;
  const dy = (subject._lanceY || 0) - sprite._homeY;
  subject.pushMoves([
    [SE, { name: "Wind7" }],
    [PARABOLA, dx, dy, -12, 24],
    [SE, { name: "ExcusezMoi" }],
    [WAIT, 24],
    [PARABOLA, -48, 0, -12, 24]
  ]);
}>>
